contentList.content: The Warrior

The Warrior is the first Guardian Constellation and he protects his charges during their Seasons. The Warrior's own season is Last Seed, when his Strength is needed for the harvest. His charges are the Lady, the Steed, and the Lord. Those born under the sign of the Warrior are skilled with weapons of all kinds, but prone to short tempers.
Passives: <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_Warwyrd">Warwyrd</LSTag>
Warwyrd
Those born under the sign of the Warrior may add their Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to their weapon attack damage once per short rest.
The Mage

The Mage is a Guardian Constellation who's Season is Rain's Hand, when Magicka was first used by mankind. His charges are the Apprentice, the Atronach, and the Ritual. Those born under the Mage have more Magicka and talent for all kinds of spellcasting, but are often arrogant and absent-minded.
Powers: <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_Shout_Fay">Fay</LSTag>
Fay
Those born under the sign of the Mage have the power to restore <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag>.
Those born under the sign of the Mage have the power to restore a Level [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
Fay (Level 1)
Fay (Level 2)
Fay (Level 3)
The Thief

The Thief is the last Guardian Constellation, and her Season is the darkest month of Evening Star. Her charges are the Lover, the Shadow, and the Tower. Those born under the sign of the Thief are not typically thieves, though they take risks more often and only rarely come to harm. They will run out of luck eventually, however, and rarely live as long as those born under other signs.
Passives: <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_Thief">Hara</LSTag>
Hara

Those born under the sign of the Thief can make a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag>. If they already know Sneak Attack, they have an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SneakAttack_Charge">Sneak Attack Charge</LSTag>.
The Lady

The Lady is one of the Warrior's charges, and her Season is Hearthfire. Those born under the sign of the Lady are kind and tolerant.
Passives: <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_Lady">Lady's Favor</LSTag>
Lady's Favor
Those born under the sign of the Lady may add twice their Level to their <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> when levelling up.
The Steed

The Steed is one of the Warrior's charges, and her Season is Mid Year. Those born under the sign of the Steed are impatient, and always hurrying from one place to another.
Passives: <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_Steed">Charioteer</LSTag>
Charioteer
Those born under the sign of the Steed gain an additional [1] <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag>, and are Immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HASTE_LETHARGY">Lethargy</LSTag> .
Trollkin
Those born under the sign of the Lord are <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Fire.
The Lord

The Lord's Season is First Seed, and he oversees all of Tamriel during the planting. Those born under the sign of the Lord are stronger and healthier than those born under other signs.
Passives: <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_Lord">Troll-kin</LSTag> Powers: <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_BloodOfTheNorth">Blood of the North</LSTag>
Elfborn
You are <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Magical attacks. You also gain an additional 1st Level <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>, and receive the spell Thunderwave.
The Apprentice

The Apprentice's Season is Sun's Height. Those born under the sign of the Apprentice have a special affinity for magic of all kinds, but are equally as vulnerable to it.
Passives: <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_Apprentice">Elfborn</LSTag>
The Ritual

The Ritual is one of the Mage's Charges and its Season is Morning Star. Those born under this sign have a variety of abilities depending on the aspects of the moons and the Divines.
Powers: <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_MarasGift">Mara's Gift</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_BlessedWord">Blessed Word</LSTag>
You receive the powers of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_MarasGift">Mara's Gift</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_BlessedWord">Blessed Word</LSTag>.
The Lover

The Lover is one of the Thief's Charges and her Season is Sun's Dawn. Those born under the sign of the Lover are graceful and passionate.
Passives: <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_TheLover">Mooncalf</LSTag> Powers: <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_LoversEmbrace">Lover's Embrace</LSTag>
Mooncalf

You have <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Performance">Performance</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Persuasion">Persuasion</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="Athletics">Athletics</LSTag>.
Moonshadow

You have <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Stealth">Stealth</LSTag>, and may become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> when Heavily or Lightly Obscured.
Warden
Those born under the sign of the Tower have <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="SleightOfHand">Sleight Of Hand</LSTag>.
Blood of the North
Your Lordly blood heals you for 3 points at the beginning of each of your turns for the duration of the power.
Your Lordly blood is giving you [1] at the start of each turn.
Mara's Gift
Once per short or long rest, you may restore an amount of <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> equal to [1].
Blessed Word
All <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Undead">undead</LSTag> within a [1] sphere within range are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TURNED">Turned</LSTag>.
Lover's Embrace
You reach out to embrace a creature. The target must make a Willpower <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against your <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag>.
The Shadow

The Shadow's Season is Second Seed. The Shadow grants those born under her sign the ability to hide in Shadows. They often go unnoticed even when their presence should be obvious.
Passives: <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_Shadow">Moonshadow</LSTag>
Moonshadow
When using this power, you and the items you carry are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>.
The Tower

The Tower is one of the Thief's Charges and its Season is Frostfall. Those born under the sign of the Tower have a knack for finding Gold and can open locks of all kinds.
Passives: <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_TheTower">Warden</LSTag> Powers: <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_TowerKey">Tower Key</LSTag>
Tower Key
You may unlock any object locked by non-magical means.
The Serpent

The Serpent wanders about in the sky and has no Season, though its motions are predictable to a degree. No characteristics are common to all who are born under the sign of the Serpent. Those born under this sign are the most blessed and the most cursed.
Passives: <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_EverRoam_Passive">Ever-Roaming</LSTag> Powers: <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="AGTT_BS_StarCurse">Star-Curse</LSTag>
Ever-Roaming
Gain an additional Bonus Action.
Star-Curse
Once per long rest, you can inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag> on a creature that you touch, causing them to take [1], then [2] per turn for the duration of the power.
In addition, you take [1] at the beginning of each turn for the duration of the power.
Star-Cursed
You've been <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AGTT_STATUS_STARCURSE">cursed</LSTag> by one born under the sign of the Serpent. At the end of each turn, you take [1].
You've cursed a character with your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AGTT_STATUS_STARCURSE">Star-Curse</LSTag>. You share in the pain, taking [1].
The Atronach

The Atronach's Season is Sun's Dusk. Those born under this sign are natural Sorcerers with deep reserves of Magicka, but they cannot generate Magicka of their own.
Passives: <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AGTT_StuntedMagicka">Stunted Magicka</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="AGTT_Wombburn">Wombburn</LSTag>
Stunted Magicka
You cannot recover Spell Slots via Short or Long Rests. To recover these, you must be the target of a hostile Spell. You will gain a Spell Slot of equal Spell Level to what was cast on you.
Wombburn
You have resistance to damage from Magical sources, and gain an Atronach Spell Slot each level.
